author: Durk
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the Family cog! Use `[p]help Family` for commands.

For family tree visualization, ensure `networkx` and `matplotlib` are installed.
name: Family
short: Marriage, adoption, and family tree system.
description: A comprehensive family system with marriage, adoption, sire relationships, and visual family trees. Features include proposals with accept/decline buttons, polyamory and incest settings, and network graph visualization of family connections.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord user IDs and family relationship data (marriages, parent-child relationships) globally across all servers. This data is used to track virtual family connections and generate family trees.
